Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Estes
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Morse, Sheridan and Touhy: due to, street blockage near Clark/Estes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Morse, Sheridan and Touhy: due to, street blockage near Clark/Estes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with delays due to to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd Street Beach
ShortDescription: Eastbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Stony Island, 64th and Blackstone: due to street blockage near 63rd Street Beach.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Stony Island, 64th and Blackstone: due to street blockage near 63rd Street Beach.
